game.description: Defeat the Dark Sorcerer Xarath and save the land of Eridoria from his dark magic.
game.objective: Collect three ancient artifacts to weaken Xarath's powers.
game.quest_giver: Eilif Stonefist, the dwarf lord of Kragnir

item.name: Dragon Slayer Sword
item.description: A powerful sword with a dragon slayer crystal embedded in its hilt.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Amulet of Light from the ancient ruins of Eldrador.
tasks.location: The Wysteria Jungle, near the ancient ruin of Eldrador
tasks.objective: Find and claim the amulet without triggering any traps.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Sceptre of Elements from the Elemental Plane.
tasks.location: The Elemental Plane, in the heart of a stormy mountain range
tasks.objective: Defeat the elemental guardians to retrieve the sceptre.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Tome of Shadows from the Shadowfell.
tasks.location: The Shadowfell, in the dark and foreboding forest of Mor'Dhul
tasks.objective: Find and claim the tome without being consumed by darkness.
